top_comment.text:
Where can I purchase Shopkins? I can't find them in Walmart, and I live 
very far away from any Big-Name stores.﻿
top_comment.author: Beaglelover333

comments.text:
Try the Entertainer if there's one near you!
😉🌸🌹🌻🌺🌼
comments.author: Hasnat Mumtaz

top_comment.text:
Oh did you know they are cheaper at toys r us? At target the separate 
little shopkins are $2.99 but at Toys R Us they are only $1.99! Just wanted 
to let you know! ﻿
top_comment.author: chris rees

captions.text:
Hello Disney Car Toys here. And earlier we
opened up four surprise Shopkins shopping

baskets. And so now we are going to open up
a Shopkins five pack. I have here from season

one Shopkins a five pack. And you can see
four of them but one is hidden so we have

one surprise. and when we are all done with
them boxing. we are going to play with our

fruit and veggie stand and bakery. with our
new Shopkins. Now lets open up our Shopkins

here. I'm super excited to see whats inside.
You can see four of them. And there's one

surprise on hidden somewhere in here. or maybe
in one of the baskets. We will find out soon,

this is my first pack. And oh no. We lost
somebody already. a little tropical drink.

Get back in there. Lets check out each shopping
bad. These are each soft rubber bags. nothing

in here. nothing in here. Nope nothing. empty
bags. another empty bag oh and there it is

its not in a bag its hiding in the bad of
the container. They really like to hide these

things. and its in a blue bag so we can't
even see whats inside. And what did we get.

Its green. Its a milk carton. Check this little
girl out. oh its spilt milk. Its hard to see

but she had two little tears. Don't cry over
spilled milk. out spilled milk character has

a green circle meaning that rare. yay rare
toy. Also in this five pack we have this blue

heart candy shes super happy and she says
I love you. The heart is called Candy Kisses.

How cute is that? and she has a green circle
meaning shes rare too. The five pack also

came with this green super happy toothbrush.
And our toothbrush is called Toofs. and Shes

common and we also have our nice tropical
drink here. With a little umbrella on top.

And a fruit, Yay pineapple. This will be perfect
for our fruits and veg's stand. Our Pinaplle

is called pineapple crush. and she is common.
Now we have five new shopkins and five new

Shopkin bags. And lets put them all away.
Our spilled milk poor guy. Our tropical drink,

Pineapple our little candy heart. and out
toothbrush. We need that after we eat all

this junk. Now its time to give away some
Shopkins. Yay Rapunzel Do you want some spilled

milk? She'll probably take good care of it.
oh you dropped it. That's kind of funny. Okay

i will help you hold it. Don't spill it again.
it cries when you spill the milk. Who else

do we got. Oh belle. You can take this tropical
drink, I think she'll like it. and look your

holding it very nicely. Great work Belle.
Oh, look who's at the Shopkins it's Elsa and

her glitter Glider dress. She cares a lot
about hygiene so she taking the toothbrush.

Okay two more bags. Anna which one do you
want? Oh look shes taking the pineapple. Good

choice Anna that's really healthy. And last
but not least, its Spideman. He's going to

take the heart candy. Probably give it to Mary
Jane. Okay, grab onto the bag. Oh come one.

Oh pick it up. Spiderman. not spidy spidy
awesome. and now its time to play with our

brand new Shopkin toys. With there play sets.
Here's a cupcake which i got from the blind

bag baskets. you can spin it through the mixer.
And I've got this little swinging bakery basket

too. For our other cupcake and cute little
doughnut. Wee. In our produce section we can

weigh our little pineapple. Oh shes heavy.
Bounce bounce bounce. Its fun to play on to.

weee bouncy bouncy. But wait i can't forget
the juicer. Lets make a pinacolada smoothie.

of pineapple get down there. muh this is going
to be good. A nice juice here with coconut

and pineapple. Muh delicious. If you would
like to see more Shopkin videos on the Disney

Car Toys Channel please click like on this
video also subscribe. Now which Shopkins do

you like the most? I just wish i had a hairbrush
one. Click on the picture to watch another

fun toy video. Thanks for watching and have
a great day!

title: Frozen Elsa, Anna, Spiderman Shopping for Shopkins 5 Pack at Fruit and Veg Stand by DisneyCarToys
